name: codex-multiterm
description: Local web app to spawn and interact with multiple terminal sessions (server + React client).

scripts.setup: npm --prefix app/server ci && npm --prefix app/client ci
scripts.run:server: node scripts/kill-port.js 3001 && npm --prefix app/server run dev
scripts.dev: npm run run:server & npm run run:ui
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:server
